title: First Achievement
heading: Congrats on your first achievment.
description: This is your first step towards making a better life for yourself.

title: Homeowner - Level 1
heading: You are now a first time homeowner
description: What a big step in your life!

title: Automobile - Level 1
heading: You have purchased your first car
description: Now you can get from point A to point B

title: Owning your first pet
heading: You have owned your first pet
description: Owning a pet is a set towards being a responsible adult

title: Graduated from college
heading: Graduated from College
description: College is a gateway to new oppertunities.  By studying hard, bucking down, and overcoming adversity you have made earned your college degree

title: Learned to Cook
heading: You learned how to cook
description: Cooking is a way to stimulate peoples senses.  Taste, smell, texture, and presentation make for a great meal.

title: Travel
heading: You made your first big trip
description: Traveling the world you can meet new people, learn about other cultures, and educate yourself

title: Backpacking
heading: You went on your first backpacking adventure
description: Backpacking is a great way to see new places and get great excercise.
